title: True Blue Vegan Jamie Lynne
description:
Lala is one week post-op and loving the results! She shares some details surrounding her two procedures (boobs & left ear), and the video she posted to IG while still in recovery. She also recounts some recent red flags that got a couple of potential dating interests shut down permanently. And then true-blue vegan Jamie Lynne, who hosts the “Jamie All Over” podcast, joins! She talks about her own vegan journey, busts the biggest myths around veganism, offers tips on how to pursue a vegan lifestyle, and suggests easy swaps you can make to start the journey. She also educates on the true workings of slaughterhouses and chicken farms!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
